mapper.insert: insert into goods (gname, picture, specification, price, cost, stock, sale_volume, cat_id, user_id) values (#{name}, #{picture}, #{specification}, #{price}, #{cost}, #{stock}, #{sale_volume}, #{cat_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update goods set gname = #{name}, picture = #{picture}, specification = #{specification}, price = #{price}, cost = #{cost}, stock = #{stock}, sale_volume = #{sale_volume}, on_sale = #{on_sale}, cat_id = #{cat_id} where goods_id = #{goods_id}
mapper.select: select goods_id, gname, picture, price, specification, cost, stock, sale_volume, on_sale, cat_id, date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m') as formatted_date from goods where goods_id = #{goods_id}
